pages.title: Access Port
pages.text: The Access Port convert solid materials (usually ingots) into fuel reactants that will fill your $(l:reactor/part-fuelrod)Fuel Rods$(/l) and power your Reactor.$(br2)In the graphical interface you can set the Port mode: in $(bold)inlet mode$() the Port will accept fuel source materials, in $(bold)outlet mode$() it will output wastes.
A $(l:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to change the Port mode.$(br2)The graphical interface can also be used to insert and extract materials manually.

$(l)Mandatory:$() no, but you will need a couple anyway$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes$(br)$(l)Wrench:$() a $(l:misc/wrench)wrench$(/l) can be used to toggle the Port mode
